name: Creepy Capsules
description:
Create your character and start your monster collection! Care for each monster to raise your friendship level. Give them gifts and receive their trophies. Collect all 14 available trophies and unlock the final, scariest monster!

  • 14 Monsters and 1 Final Bonus Monster
  • 2 possible endings
  • 3 Gameplay Modes
  • Hidden Point-and-Click puzzles
